title: Telco Customer Churn Prediction
description: A production-ready, end-to-end pipeline for predicting customer churn using the Telco Customer Churn dataset. Features advanced feature engineering, robust modeling, model explainability with SHAP, customer segmentation, a REST API, and an interactive Streamlit dashboard.

title: Geo Wake (Expo App)
description: A geo-location based alarm app built with Expo. Set alarms that trigger when you reach a location, not just a time. Built using React Native, JS, and geo utilities.

title: Coming Soon
description: More impactful projects are on the way! Stay tuned.
